title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search
description: When using the Ctrl+F1 shortcut in the help search, it is observed that it works inconsistently across different fields.
OB: The Ctrl+F1 shortcut is not functioning consistently across all fields in the help search. Some fields respond correctly, while others do not.
SR: Ensure that Ctrl+F1 consistently works on all fields within the help search functionality.
